name: OverSpooked
description:
This is just a prototype, tell me your thoughts(I have a lot of stuff in mind tho)

Story:

You are a boy that wanted to go to a friend to carve his pumpkins, but got lost on the road. Midnight came and monsters started appearing.

Gameplay:

Move with W, A, S, D or with arrow keys and jump with space

Shoot - left click

Dash - left shift

Interact with alter: E

With the alter you can sacrifice your health to increase maximum ammo or maximum health

This project is a total chaos, I suggest you don't press the escape key

Credits:

Graphics: Stefanarctic and SonofThorin

Gameplay: Stefanarctic

Other:

Skeleton Sprite: https://vimlark.itch.io/vimlark-asset-pack

Statue and bush: https://anokolisa.itch.io/moon-graveyard

Theme:

You can sacrifice your health to gain power ups
